articles.title: Are women with PCOS at increased risk of high blood pressure?
articles.description: PCOS Awareness Month: It is known that women with PCOS are almost 3 times more likely to have type 2 diabetes, according to a study titled ‘Women’s Health Study’ by Apple and Harvard
articles.content: Every year, September is observed as PCOS Awareness Month in a bid to improve the lives of those affected by polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) and to help them overcome their symptoms as well as prevent and reduce their risks for life-threatening cond... [606 chars]

articles.title: iPad Air 6 Could Launch In October As The Sole iPad Refresh This Year: Report
articles.description: Apple could launch the iPad Air 6 in October as the sole iPad refresh of this year with newer internal specifications, a Weibo account has claimed.
articles.content: Apple iPad Air 6 could launch this October and may be the only refreshed iPad from the lineup this year, as per a new Weibo rumor and Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. Currently in its fifth-generation, the iPad Air is offered with the Apple M1 chipset and is... [1458 chars]

articles.title: Apple Could Finally Convince More Android Users To Buy iPhones: Here’s How
articles.description: Apple iPhone 15 series with USB C charging means you could get faster charging speeds and ease of using more accessories.
articles.content: Apple iPhone 15 series is launching this week, and the wait will be finally over to see the company adopt USB-C charging for its new iPhones. Apple was not keen on this move for obvious reasons, but the stringent EU laws have forced the company’s han... [1511 chars]
